p: Eligible participants were asked to consent a second time to enroll in the study after interviewers explained the RCT study objectives, procedures, risks and benefits to the participants, and answered any questions. Consenting participants were assigned a unique identification number. They then completed the baseline questionnaire and Timeline Followback (TLFB) to measure daily alcohol use over the past 30 days [ 46]. Eligible participants were also randomly assigned to one of the three study arms in a 1:1:1 ratio.
